titleStmt.title: Enchiridion medicum: containing the causes, signs, and cures of all those diseases, that do chiefly affect the body of man: divided into three books. With alphabetical tables of such matters as are therein contained. Whereunto is added a treatise, De facultatibus medicamentorum compositorum, & dosibus. / By Robert Bayfield.
titleStmt.author: Bayfield, Robert, b. 1629.

titleStmt.title: Enchiridion medicum: containing the causes, signs, and cures of all those diseases, that do chiefly affect the body of man: divided into three books. With alphabetical tables of such matters as are therein contained. Whereunto is added a treatise, De facultatibus medicamentorum compositorum, & dosibus. / By Robert Bayfield.
titleStmt.author: Bayfield, Robert, b. 1629.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by E. Tyler for Joseph Cranford, and are to be sold at his shop at the sign of the Phenix in S. Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: "Tractatus de facultatibus medicamentorum compositorum, & dosibus" has caption title.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
